title: Experiencing dramatic FPS drops in game even though I've never had FPS issues before
body:
Hello,

I've been experiencing some pretty dramatic FPS drops in game recently even though I've hardly ever had any FPS issues in game before. It's been happening for the past week or so, my FPS will just sporadically drop from around 90 to 10-20 and then come back up again. Seems to be most prevalent when there's a lot of fighting/combat going on in game. The only other time my FPS is known to drop a lot is when I play the Nexus Siege game mode.

Here are my system specs:

> Mac OS Sierra
Version 10.12.2
iMac, Late 2013
2.9 GHz Intel Core i5 Processor
8 GB 1600 MHz DDR3
NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M 1024 MB

Any help would be greatly appreciated ^_^

replies.body: Have you resolved your problem? I have had this problem since beta client update. Tried going back to legacy. Tried different drivers. I also know its the game because I play Overwatch on max settings and get 90fps. I have used gpu-z and noticed that when i play overwatch, my card is being used at 99% , when I play league. its at 30%
Sorry, I don't have a fix :( it stopped lagging for me quite a while ago and is working fine now. Have you tried the steps detailed in the FPS issues guide linked by Porocles below?

There may be outdated drivers or bad game files causing sudden frame drops.  I recommend running through the steps found in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help!  Let me know if you have any questions!
